amendment.description: To modify the project for flood control, Big Sioux River and Skunk Creek, Sioux Falls, South Dakota.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4735 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4735 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3962; text: CR S3962) To modify the project for flood control, Big Sioux River and Skunk Creek, Sioux Falls, South Dakota.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4735 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4735 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Thune to Amendment SA 4707.
